JobFullDesc: The City Manager is a people manager who will lead commercial efforts across Sellers and Account Managers within a region. This individual drives the commercial strategy within our largest and highest potential cities, making commercial decisions to help us against our goal of winning selection street by street and geo by geo. City Managers own the results of all sides of the marketplace - not just selection but also experience. What You'll DoDevelop local expertise of merchant, courier, and eater supply and demand within a large or complex regionLead team of Sellers and Account Managers to drive commercial strategy and prioritiesMake decisions to provide the best selection and experience within your regionOwn performance of all sides of the market (merchant, courier, and eater) in partnership with our Operations teamBuild vision and strategy in your regionBasic Qualifications4+ years of work experience across operations, sales, or account managementPreferred QualificationsExperience being a leader among peers, influencing cross-functional partners and setting an example for othersAn entrepreneurial mindset, passion for building things, working towards a shared goal, and ownership of outcomesExperience working closely and communicating effectively with diverse set of stakeholders in an ever-changing, rapid growth environment
